nodes.text: Colossus droid was a type of droid designed on Iokath after the species that created the world went extinct following the Iokath civil war. The only remaining self-aware droid on Iokath ARIES used other droids as his slaves, weaponizing them into combat units regardless of their original purpose. The Colossus droid was developed as a massive war machine dozens of meters tall and capable of wiping out an entire army.
Colossus droids appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as enemies on Iokath.
